description:
Protect your snowshoes (and protect other things from your snowshoes) with this lightweight, durable tote. Large enough for your snowshoes and clothing, poles and associated gear, it's an ideal solution for travel to the trailhead and off-season storage.

  • Durable polyester fabric is coated with polyurethane to protect against moisture and abrasions
  • Extra volume allows you to pack protective materials around snowshoes
  • Hook and loop pole straps keep things organized
  • Oversized plastic zipper pull loops for easy opening and closing with gloved hands
  • Reflective logo detail
name: MEC Fresh Tracks Snowshoe Tote
